fd.recommendation: Use major banks for stable returns above inflation (7-8% pa).

gold.recommendation: Split between digital gold and RBI sovereign gold bonds for inflation protection.

debt_funds.recommendation: Choose short-duration debt funds for safety and liquidity.

stocks_selected.name: Bharat Electronics Limited
stocks_selected.why_selected: Strong government contracts, robust order book, low debt for stability, impressive long-term growth profile.
stocks_selected.future_outlook: Continued spending on defense electronics positions it for steady returns above sector average.

stocks_selected.name: Hindalco Industries Limited
stocks_selected.why_selected: Efficient cost structure, strong presence in aluminium, and is a classic value play with stable fundamentals.
stocks_selected.future_outlook: Rising demand in auto and packaging will help margin expansion and incremental price appreciation.

stocks_selected.name: Cummins India Limited
stocks_selected.why_selected: Clean balance sheet, exceptional ROE, and a global leader in engine tech supporting India's infrastructure.
stocks_selected.future_outlook: The infra cycle and exports expansion can drive multi-year compounded returns near 12-15%.

stocks_selected.name: Maruti Suzuki India Limited
stocks_selected.why_selected: India's market leader for passenger vehicles, consistently growing net profits and keeping leverage ultra-low.
stocks_selected.future_outlook: Expected to ride India's middle-class growth and EV expansion, targeting double-digit annual gains.

stocks_selected.name: Bharat Petroleum Corp. Ltd.
stocks_selected.why_selected: Consistent dividend payer, solid government backing. Valuations are attractive for margin recovery and high cash flows.
stocks_selected.future_outlook: As India urbanizes, expect energy usage to rise; good for moderate return seekers over the next 3-5 years.

stocks_selected.name: Coromandel International Ltd.
stocks_selected.why_selected: Major agro-inputs firm, high growth rate in rural sector, attractive for diversification outside financials & IT.
stocks_selected.future_outlook: Demand for fertilizers and crop enhancements will remain robust, supporting 8-10% annualized returns.

stocks_selected.name: Torrent Pharmaceuticals Ltd.
stocks_selected.why_selected: Strong brand in the Indian pharma market, robust profitability, rides on healthcare demand and exports.
stocks_selected.future_outlook: New launches and export focus should deliver healthy growth, and mitigate sector cyclicality.

mutual_funds_selected.name: Parag Parikh Flexi Cap Fund
mutual_funds_selected.why_invest: Proven track record in both domestic and US equities. Good balance for 5-year moderate risk.

mutual_funds_selected.name: Quant Multi Cap Fund
mutual_funds_selected.why_invest: Aggressive approach with tactical asset allocation, ideal for creating alpha in rising markets.

what_if_analysis.conservative_return: If the portfolio grows at 8% annualized, your ₹72,000 could grow to ~₹105,815 after 5 years.
what_if_analysis.moderate_return: At a more realistic 12% annualized (historical equities), ₹72,000 can grow to ~₹127,012 in 5 years.
what_if_analysis.optimistic_return: If markets outperform (16% pa), ₹72,000 could rise to ~₹151,361 in 5 years.

summary: This portfolio blends high-quality stocks from multiple sectors—industrial, energy, consumer, pharma—keeping risk moderate but returns steady. Mutual funds add extra diversification and professional management. About 1/3rd in gold, FD, and debt gives stability and liquidity. The selection is designed for moderate risk and a 5-year growth outlook.

risk_analysis.mild_crash: A 10% market decline could mean a drop of ~₹4,800 in your equity sleeve. Diversifiers cushion some losses.
risk_analysis.moderate_crash: If markets fall 20%, your equity could lose ~₹9,600. Fixed-income and gold would reduce the total hit to about ₹7,200.
risk_analysis.severe_crash: Even with a 30% drawdown, the portfolio would lose ~₹14,400 in equities; gold and FD reduce total loss to ~₹10,000.
risk_analysis.summary: Portfolio is balanced so market downturns hit only the equity part. FDs and gold remain stable, debt funds are minimally impacted. Recovery typically takes 1-2 years.

education_tips.diversification_importance: Spreading investments across sectors and types lowers risk and avoids big losses from any one area.
education_tips.long_term_perspective: 5-year horizon is ideal—let compounding work, avoid panic in down markets.
education_tips.rebalancing_strategy: Review allocation yearly—shift profits from outperformers to underweighted areas or add to FDs/gold when markets overheat.
education_tips.understanding_risk: Moderate risk means accepting short-term volatility for better long-term gains. Don't expect linear growth—patience leads to wealth.
